Export.Routine:
WWWVAR
#include COMSYS
#define LogR(%1,%2) ; #define LogRx(%1) ; #define LogRm(%1) ; #;define LogR(%1,%2) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))= %1_"^WWWVAR("_%2_") : "_$zh $$$JournalOn #;define LogRx(%1) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn #;define LogRm(%1) $$$JournalOff m ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; LADEN VARIABLEN ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 03-Jan-2014 shobby CORE-303: CacheIndex ; 18-Dec-2013 shobby CORE-291: YUSENAME ; 22-May-2013 shobby CORE-107.1: Additional YPOPUP so that Menu is not shown on a search function within a popup. ; 27-Jul-2012 SCR SR18070: Record IP Address ; 06-Aug-2010 shobby SR17488: call to SET^WWWUSERAGENT ; 27-Jul-2010 shobby SR17457: YUSERAGENT if form is a popup window. ; 18-Nov-2009 GRF SR16871: Default to top level location rather than first ; in order; clear out old comment code blocks ; 21-Oct-2009 shobby SR16948: Retrieve value of original URL (YXURL) for ; storage in CacheTempURL ; 02-Mar-2009 GRF SR16065: Reverted change - breaks Help button ; 27-Feb-2009 FIS SR16065: force new YUSER after Cache re-start ; 15-Jan-2009 GRF SR15853: Pass audit string to NewUserSession ; 20-Oct-2008 FIS SR15824: pass flag YLOCKKILL to kill any lock during ; form load ; 19-Aug-2008 FIS SR15853: create session in common routine ; 01-Nov-2007 SCR SR15606: Moved Session creation to a function. ; 26-Oct-2007 SCR SR15606: Added new Session Variable/Object %alSession ; used for V2 code ; 28-Jun-2006 GRF Naked reference; quits; Doco; !=>|| ; 10-Nov-2005 JW SR13817: Enable child users ; 30-May-2005 RobertW SR12056: Attempt at Performance Increase ; 25.11.2004 FIS BROWSER TYP ; 08.04.2004 FIS 25459;IMMER ALLE VARIABLEN LADEN ; 10.03.2004 FIS CUSTOMIZING;25301 ; 03.06.1998 DT (C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do ^WWWVORG ; set standard variables new idCountry,tmsNow,dteNow,tmeNow
set tmsNow = $horolog set dteNow = +tmsNow set tmeNow = $piece(tmsNow,$$$COMMA,2)
SET YBED = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YBED")) ;BEDIENER SET YUSER = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YUSER")) ;USER NUMMER ;numeral SET YPWD = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YPWD")) ;PASSWORD SET YXURL = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YXURL")) ;SR16948 (required) set YPOPUP= $get(%(YQUERY,"YPOPUP")) ;CORE-107.1
IF $GET(%("env","REMOTE_PASSWD"))'="" SET YPWD=$GET(%("env","REMOTE_USER"))
; FIXME: ; For appropriate license count the User should request a new Session Id (YUSER) after Cache restart. ; Because not all SessionId's are logged in CacheTemp (child users !) this test causes trouble in sub-windows (endless loop) ;if ((YUSER '= "") && ('$data(^CacheTempSession(YUSER)))) set YUSER = "" //after Cache re-start SR16065 - reverted
set YBED=$$$UPPER(YBED) if YBED="" { set YBED="UNKNOWN" set YUSER = $$NewUserSession^WWWUSER("WWWVAR:1") set %(YQUERY,"YUSER")=YUSER set ^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)=Y_YBED }
IF YBED="" SET YBED = "^^^"
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; YBEX objWWW013 personnel ; YUSER1 objWWWUSER ; YVOR1 objWWW012 ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
IF $GET(YUSER)="" IF YBED'="" DO ;NEUER USER ; new user . set YUSER = $$NewUserSession^WWWUSER("WWWVAR:2") . SET %(YQUERY,"YUSER")=YUSER . SET ^WWWLOGIN(0,dteNow,tmeNow,YBED,1)=YUSER_Y_$$IPAddress() ;LOGIN FILE ;SR18070 . SET ^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)=$zconvert($GET(YPWD),"U")_Y_YBED_Y_dteNow_Y_tmeNow . IF $DATA(^WWW013(0,YBED,1)) DO . . NEW YBEX,YDH . . SET YBEX = ^WWW013(0,YBED,1) . . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,20) = $PIECE(YBEX,Y,5) . . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,19) = $$^WWWLANGU(YBED) . . SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,35) = $$^WWWUSERAGENT() ; BROWSER TYPE (MSIE, NETSCAPE, ...) . . SET YMENU = $PIECE(YBEX,Y,11) . . SET YMFA = $PIECE(YBEX,Y,10) . . SET YA = $PIECE(YBEX,Y,13)+1 . . ; . . ; FIXME : usage log should not kept withing employee master data. Should move to separate structure. <GRF> . . ; . . SET $PIECE(YBEX,Y,13) = YA . . ; "Your Visit No.: ##, Last Visit: ##/##/##,##:##:##" . . SET $PIECE(YBEX,Y,16) = $$^WWWTEXT(290)_" "_YA_", "_$$^WWWTEXT(291)_" "_$$^WWWDATE($PIECE(YBEX,Y,14))_", "_$$^WWWTIME($PIECE(YBEX,Y,15)) . . SET $PIECE(YBEX,Y,14) = dteNow . . SET $PIECE(YBEX,Y,15) = tmeNow . . SET ^WWW013(0,YBED,1) = YBEX . . SET YDH = $ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,"")) IF YDH'="" IF +YDH'=dteNow KILL ^WWWZWS(0,YDH) . . SET YDH = $ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,""),-1) IF YDH'="" IF +YDH'=dteNow KILL ^WWWZWS(0,YDH) . ; . SET YA="" . FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWWUSER(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . . IF $GET(YMFA)'=0 QUIT:YA=YUSER . . IF $GET(YMFA)=1 IF $PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YA,1)),Y,2)=YBED KILL ^WWWUSER(0,YA) KILL ^WWWUSER1(0,YA) QUIT ;FIS;06.05.04;NEU:WWWUSER1 . . IF ($PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YA,1)),Y,3)+1)<dteNow KILL ^WWWUSER(0,YA) KILL ^WWWUSER1(0,YA) QUIT ;FIS;06.05.04;NEU:WWWUSER1
;SAVE USER VORGABEN;FIS;06.05.04;25460 ;WIRD EINE ROUTINE MIT JOB AUFGERUFEN, SIND DIE CSP-OBJEKTE NICHT MEHR VORHANDEN. IN DIESEM FALL ;KANN ES WÜNSCHENSWERT SEIN, DIE CGI-VARIABLEN ZURPÜCKZUHOLEN (IN WWWVORG) IF YHYPER'=0 IF $GET(YUSER)'="" DO . NEW YVAR . IF '$DATA(^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%KEY")) DO ;IF NEW USER ONLY ! . . SET YVAR(1) = "" . . FOR SET YVAR(1) = $ORDER(%KEY(YVAR(1))) QUIT:YVAR(1)="" DO . . . IF $GET(%KEY(YVAR(1)))'="" SET ^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%KEY",YVAR(1)) = %KEY(YVAR(1)) QUIT ;NUR EIN TEIL ;only uni- part . . . IF $ORDER(%KEY(YVAR(1),""))="" SET ^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%KEY",YVAR(1)) = %KEY(YVAR(1)) QUIT ;NUR EIN TEIL ;only uni- part . . . SET YVAR(2) = "" . . . FOR SET YVAR(2) = $ORDER(%KEY(YVAR(1),YVAR(2))) QUIT:YVAR(2)="" DO . . . . SET ^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%KEY",YVAR(1),YVAR(2)) = %KEY(YVAR(1),YVAR(2)) . ; . IF '$DATA(^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%CGIEVAR")) DO ;IF NEW USER ONLY ! . . SET YVAR(1) = "" . . FOR SET YVAR(1)=$ORDER(%CGIEVAR(YVAR(1))) QUIT:YVAR(1)="" DO . . . IF $GET(%CGIEVAR(YVAR(1)))'="" SET ^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%CGIEVAR",YVAR(1)) = %CGIEVAR(YVAR(1)) QUIT ;NUR EIN TEIL ;only uni- part . . . IF $ORDER(%CGIEVAR(YVAR(1),""))="" SET ^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%CGIEVAR",YVAR(1)) = %CGIEVAR(YVAR(1)) QUIT ;NUR EIN TEIL ;only uni- part . . . SET YVAR(2) = "" . . . FOR SET YVAR(2) = $ORDER(%CGIEVAR(YVAR(1),YVAR(2))) QUIT:YVAR(2)="" DO . . . . SET ^WWWUSER1(0,YUSER,"%CGIEVAR",YVAR(1),YVAR(2)) = %CGIEVAR(YVAR(1),YVAR(2))
// FIXME : How much of the following is really necessary SET YM = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YM")) ;Company IF YM="" SET YM = 0
set YLOCATION = $$GetTopLevel^WWW0121() ;CORE-303 if YLOCATION="" set YLOCATION = 1 ; FIXME : May not exist - see "get top level entity" logic elsewhere
if $piece($get(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,35)'="" { ;SR17488 do SET^WWWUSERAGENT($piece($get(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,35))
} else { do SET^WWWUSERAGENT($piece($get(^WWWUSER(0,$piece(YUSER,"x",1),1)),Y,35)) } ;SR17488SET YUSERAGENT = $PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,35) ;FIS;25.11.2004;BROWSER TYP ;SR17488if YUSERAGENT="" SET YUSERAGENT = $PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,$piece(YUSER,"x",1),1)),Y,35) ;SR17454
;SR17488IF YUSERAGENT="" SET YUSERAGENT = "MSIE"
if $get(YBED)'="" { ; FIXME : Change YM to be always 0 - remove from WWWUSER and WWW013 once deprecated <GRF> if YUSER'="" set YM = $$$WWWUSERLastCompany($get(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))) if YM'="" set YM = $$$WWW013HomeCompany($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1))) if YM="" set YM = 0
set YLOCATION = $$$WWW013HomeLocation($get(^WWW013(0,YBED,1))) if YLOCATION="" set YLOCATION = $$GetTopLevel^WWW0121() ;CORE-303
if YLOCATION="" set YLOCATION = 1
if $get(%(YQUERY,"YM"))'="" set YM = %(YQUERY,"YM") set SPRACHE = $$^WWWLANGU(YBED) if $get(%(YQUERY,"YLOCATION"))'="" set YLOCATION = $get(%(YQUERY,"YLOCATION")) }
set YUSER = $get(%(YQUERY,"YUSER"))
do CopyParent^WWWUSER(YUSER) //SR13942
;IF ($GET(YFORM)="") || ($EXTRACT($GET(EP),1,7)="WWWMANU") I $G(YUSER)'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,5)="",$PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6)="",$PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,10)="" ;NEUE SEITE ;IF $GET(YFORM)="" I $G(YUSER)'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,5)="",$PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6)="",$PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,10)="" ;NEUE SEITE SET YFORM = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YFORM")) ;FORMULAR ;form SET YMENUROT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YMENUROT")) ;ROTINA VINDA DO MENU IF $GET(YHTMFORM)="" SET YHTMFORM = "WWW" ;KEIN SAVE ;no if (YHTMFORM="WWW") && (YFORM'="") && ($$$WWW120SaveServerdata($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)))) set YHTMFORM="WWW2"
IF YUSER'="" DO ;SUCHEN ALTE VARIABLEN ;seek . NEW YUSER1 . SET YUSER1 = $GET(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)) . SET YPWD = $PIECE(YUSER1,Y,1) . IF $PIECE(YUSER1,Y,20)'="" SET YM = $PIECE(YUSER1,Y,20) . IF $PIECE(YUSER1,Y,21)'="" SET YLOCATION = $PIECE(YUSER1,Y,21) . SET YBSZ = "" . SET YTRAKT = +$GET(%(YQUERY,"YTRAKT")) . ; NOTE : No class structure for ^WWWZWS . IF '$DATA(^WWWZWS(0,dteNow,YUSER,YTRAKT)) SET YTRAKT = 0 ; VARIABLEN AUS SICHERHEITSKOPIE ;FIS,06.03.03 . ;IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,159)=1 SET YTRAKT = 0 ; IMMER ALLE VARIABLEN LADEN ;FIS;25459;08.04.04 . IF $PIECE(YVOR1,Y,159)=1 SET YTRAKT = 0 ; IMMER ALLE VARIABLEN LADEN . FOR YBSI=1:1 SET YBSZ=$ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,dteNow,YUSER,YTRAKT,YBSZ)) QUIT:YBSZ="" DO . . QUIT:YBSZ="YBSZ" . . IF $EXTRACT(YBSZ)="V" IF $GET(LASTUSEDFORM)'="" IF $GET(YFORM)'=$GET(LASTUSEDFORM) QUIT ;WENN FORMULARTAUSCH, DANN NICHT X VARIABLEN ÜBERTRAGEN . . QUIT:YBSZ="SPRACHE" . . QUIT:YBSZ="LANGUAGE" . . QUIT:$FIND(YBSZ," ") . . QUIT:$FIND(YBSZ,YQUERY) . . QUIT:$FIND(YBSZ,$CHAR(9)) . . IF $DATA(^WWWZWS(0,dteNow,YUSER,YTRAKT,YBSZ,1)) SET @YBSZ = ^WWWZWS(0,dteNow,YUSER,YTRAKT,YBSZ,1) ;USER VARIABLEN ZURÜCKHOLEN ;FIS, 06.03.03
if (+YM=0) && (YM'=0) set @YM=YM ; VARIABLE=MANDANTENNAME, WENN NUMERISCH ;ACHTUNG, WENN YM GLEICH WICHTIGER NAME
SET YCOUNTRY = "DE" set objWWW0121 = $get(^WWW0121(0,YM,YLOCATION,1)) set idCountry = $$$WWW0121Country(objWWW0121) if idCountry'="" set YCOUNTRY = idCountry IF $GET(COUNTRY)="" SET COUNTRY = YCOUNTRY ;TYBD;19,2,2004;UNDEF IN LISTEN IN DENEN BUNDESLAND GENUZTZ WIRD
SET YTARGET = $PIECE($PIECE(YVOR1,Y,19),"/",1)_YUSER SET YTARGET2 = $PIECE($PIECE(YVOR1,Y,19),"/",2)
;======================================= ; Extract Variables from %("%KEY") ;=======================================
SET YPARA = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YPARA")) ; PARAMETER - (Can be set by button definition)
$$$LogRx("WWWVAR-YPARA"_YPARA)
SET YAENBER = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YAENBER")) ; PARAMETER ; 23883;TYBD;04,07,2003 IF $PIECE(YPARA,Y,2)'="" SET YAENBER = $PIECE(YPARA,Y,2) ; Change Permission AUS NEUEM MENUPUNKT;23883;TYBD;04,07,2003 SET YPARA = $PIECE(YPARA,Y,1) ; PARAMETER
;---------------------------------------
SET YANZ = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YANZ")) ; Previous MENU Item SET YAUSWAHL = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YAUSWAHL")),"|"," ") ; Search Value SET YBACK = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YBACK")) ; List of Back forms SET YBUTTON = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YBUTTON")) ; Last Button ;charge Button SET YEXEC = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YEXEC")),"'`|°"_$CHAR(194),""""_""""_" %") ; EXECUTE SET YFKEY = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YFKEY")),"~|","# ") ; FIX KEY'S XX,XXX,XX SET YFORM = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YFORM")) ; form SET YINSEITE =+$GET(%(YQUERY,"YINSEITE")) ; Inner page of a form ;--------------------------------------- SET YKEY = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YKEY")),"~|"_$CHAR(194),"# ") ; KEY'S XX,XXX,XX ;SET YKEY=$$^WWWTRANSLATE(YKEY,"CHARACTERPLUS","+") IF $EXTRACT(YKEY,$LENGTH(YKEY))="," SET YKEY=$EXTRACT(YKEY,1,$LENGTH(YKEY)-1) ; Correct Key SET YKEY1 = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YKEY1")),"|"_$CHAR(194)," ") ; KEY1'S XX,XXX,XX ; 8 Bit checking IF $EXTRACT(YKEY1,$LENGTH(YKEY1))="," SET YKEY1=$EXTRACT(YKEY1,1,$LENGTH(YKEY1)-1) ; More Correction ;--------------------------------------- SET YKILL = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YKILL")) ; 1=Kill it ;2=Delete after Showing it (Half Kill) SET YMOUSETR = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YMOUSETR")) ; MOUSE TRAIL SET YNAME = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YNAME")),"|"," ") ; Header SET YNEW =+$GET(%(YQUERY,"YNEW")) ; 1=NEW BUTTON Pressed SET YNOKEY = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YNOKEY")) ; Back jump with no keys SET YNUMMER = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YNUMMER")) ; Last used Number ;charge Number ;SET YOLDVAL = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YOLDVAL")) ; ALTER VALUE; old value SET YOPEN = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YOPEN")) ; 1=OPEN OLD Record SET YOPTION = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YOPTION")) ; PARAMETER SET YOPTION1 = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YOPTION1")) ; PARAMETER SET YORIENT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YORIENT")) ; Orientation SET YPRINT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YPRINT")) ; 1=WINDOW.PRINT() SET YRETURN = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YRETURN")) ; 1=Back from a previous form SET YLOCKKILL= $GET(%(YQUERY,"YLOCKKILL")) ; 1=Kill any lock when loading form ;SR15824 SET YUSENAME = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YUSENAME")) ; Use Menu name to overwrite form description. CORE-291 ;--------------------------------------- SET YRICHT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YRICHT")) ; Next / Last Key ;charge Key IF $GET(%(YQUERY,"YRICHT1"))'="" SET YRICHT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YRICHT1")) SET %(YQUERY,"YRICHT")=YRICHT ;--------------------------------------- SET YSCREENM = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YSCREENM")) ; Test Mode IF YSCREENM="" SET YSCREENM = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YSCREENM",1)) ;SCREEN MOVEMENT TEST ;--------------------------------------- SET YSEITE =+$GET(%(YQUERY,"YSEITE")) ; Tab Number ;IF YSEITE=0 SET YSEITE = 1 ; MINDESTENS DIE SEITE 1 ;table-mat who side ;--------------------------------------- SET YSIZE = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YSIZE")) ; Text Size SET YSUCH = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YSUCH")) ; Search Number ;--------------------------------------- SET YUCI = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YUCI")) ; NAMESPACE IF YUCI="" SET YUCI = $ZUTIL(5) ; EIGENER NAMESPACE; TYBD;18,12,2003 IF YUCI="" SET YUCI = "USER" ; DFLT NAMESPACE ;--------------------------------------- SET YUSERPROFILE = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YUSERPROFILE")) SET YVORGABE = $TRANSLATE($GET(%(YQUERY,"YVORGABE")),"|"," ") ;Hidden Search Value
;=======================================
IF SPRACHE="" SET SPRACHE = "PT" SET LANGUAGE = SPRACHE
;Test for back jump KEY´S IF YNOKEY'="" IF YFORM=YNOKEY SET YKEY="" SET %(YQUERY,"YKEY")="",%KEY("YKEY")="" KILL YNOKEY ; If a back with other vars, change the back key IF (+YSCREENM=1) || (+YSCREENM=3) DO ;Change Screen Position ;FIS;CUSTOMIZING;10.03.04;25301 . SET YSCR = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YSCR")) ;Screen Mode . IF YSCR="" SET YSCR=$GET(%(YQUERY,"YSCR",1)) ; . IF YSCR'="" IF $EXTRACT(YSCR,1,4)'="CUST" DO ^WWWSCRA ; Edit Field Positions . IF YSCR'="" IF $EXTRACT(YSCR,1,4)="CUST" DO ^WWWSCRAD ; Edit Field Positions CUSTOMIZING . SET %("VAR","YSCR")=""
SET YANZAHL = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YANZAHL")) ;Number of items shown on search SET YSORT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YSORT")) ;Sort Index IF YSORT<0 SET YSORT=0 IF YSORT'="" IF YSORT'=0 SET YAUSWAHL=$$^WWWUMLAU(YAUSWAHL,2),YVORGABE=$$^WWWUMLAU(YVORGABE,2) IF $TRANSLATE(YBACK,",")="" SET YBACK="" IF YUSER'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,20) = YM IF YUSER'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,21) = YLOCATION IF $GET(%(YQUERY,"YLOCKBACK"))'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,25)=$GET(%(YQUERY,"YLOCKBACK")) ;FIS;19.04.04;TRAKTNR. FÜR RÜCKHOLEN LOCK BEI SCHLIESSEN;25534
; Transaction Tracking SET YTRAKT = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YTRAKT")) SET YTRAKTOLD = YTRAKT IF (YUSER'="") && (+YTRAKT=0) { ;if new option, start at top set $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,5) = 0 ; $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted set $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,6) = 0 set $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,9) = 0 set $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,10) = 0 } set $piece(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,36)=$$IPAddress() ;SR18070 SET YTRAKT0 = 0 ;I +YTRAKT'=0 I YUSER'="" I (YTRAKT+12)<$P($G(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,7) S YTRAKT0=1 ;NUR WENN RÜCK VERBOTEN IF YUSER'="" IF '$FIND($GET(YOPEN),"^") SET YTRAKT=$$^WWWTRAKT(YUSER) ; Next Session sequence number (transaction number) IF $GET(YBED)'="" SET SPRACHE=$$^WWWLANGU(YBED) ;K %(YQUERY,"YTRAKT") ;S %("VAR","YTRAKT")=0
do Session quit
IPAddress() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Return IP Address if available ; ; ; History: ; 27-Jul-2012 SCR SR18070: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strIP set strIP="" if $isobject($get(%request)) { set strIP =$get(%request.CgiEnvs("REMOTE_ADDR")) } quit strIP
Session ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Create a V2 Session based on V1 Session Variables ; ; Returns (implicit) : ; The %alSession object will contain all the session variable required by @NM ; ; History: ; 01-Nov-2007 SCR SR15606: Added new Session Variable/Object %alSession ; used for V2 code ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set $ztrap="SessionError"
if '$data(%alSession) { set %alSession=##class(alSYS.Session.iSession).Create() } quit
SessionError ; Session Error handler ; TODO Something quit
WSSession(pidUser) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Create a @NM Session for ; ; Returns YUSER : ; ; History: ; 23-Jun-2011 SCR SR17809: Create a Session and pass back to WS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set YBED=pidUser do ^WWWVAR quit $Get(YUSER)
